column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////It was hard deciding which appetizer to start off with. So upon recommendation from our waitress
column2: we decided on the peppered duck & goat cheese terrine
column3: which she mentioned was a staff favorite that was often overlooked by guests. This appetizer was presented in more of a pâté fashion
column4: with a side of apricot mustard and toast. The combination
column6: was absolute delectable & a must try!
